thread.title: BRIEF-UPS Capital Says Announced Expansion Of UPS Capital Cargo Finance Service With New Options On In-Transit Cargo For U.S. Importers

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-UPS Capital Says Announced Expansion Of UPS Capital Cargo Finance Service With New Options On In-Transit Cargo For U.S. Importers
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - United Parcel Service Inc:
* UPS CAPITAL SAYS ANNOUNCED EXPANSION OF UPS CAPITAL CARGO FINANCE SERVICE WITH NEW OPTIONS ON IN-TRANSIT CARGO FOR U.S. IMPORTERS
* UPS CAPITAL SAYS ENHANCED OFFERING INCREASES AMOUNT A BUSINESS CAN BORROW FROM 70% OF SUPPLIERâ€˜S COMMERCIAL INVOICE TO 100%
* UPS CAPITAL SAYS ENHANCED OFFERING INCLUDES CREDIT LINES UP TO $1.5 MILLION ON IN-TRANSIT GOODS
* UPS CAPITAL SAYS ENHANCED OFFERING INCLUDES LONGER REPAYMENT TERMS UP TO 90 DAYS FROM 75 DAYS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
